nSpeakers.description: Number of speakers in the array.

chaWavFiles.description: Wave files to play on a speaker array. The wavefiles must be transferred to the FieldSINT board before running the test.

Leq.description: Desired sound level for the calibrated output on speaker array.

path.description: Path to the wav file on the CHA to play (i.e. "MRT.wav", or "C:HINT/LIST1/file.wav"). If the path does not start with "C:", then TabSINT will assume the path is relative the the "C:User/" directory

useMetaRMS.description: When TRUE, the CHA reads the wavfile comment field for RMS values and *adds* 0.1*value(s) to the Leq(s).
